entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 before morning. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
